name: OurTupelo'sTheRundown
0:
”Alexa, open our tupelos rundown”
”Alexa, ask our tupelos rundown for the latest update”
”Alexa, start our tupelos rundown”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our tupelos rundown
des: Listen to the latest episode of Our Tupelo's The Rundown.. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
